icon.title: Icon
icon.subtitle: Universal component for displaying icons with support for built-in icons and custom SVG

basic.title: Basic Example
basic.description: Basic icon state with name, size and color. Icon name is set by the `name` property

name.title: Icon Names
name.description: The component supports many built-in icons: home, delete, envelope, save, search and others

color.title: Colors
color.description: Icon color can be changed using the `color` property. Any CSS colors are supported

size.title: Sizes
size.description: Icon size is set by the `size` property. You can use numbers (pixels) or strings with units

template.title: Custom Icons
template.description: To use your own SVG icons, use the `default` slot. This allows you to insert any custom icons

argTypes.name: Name of the built-in icon (home, delete, envelope, save, search, etc.)
argTypes.size: Icon size in pixels (number) or with units (string)
argTypes.color: Icon color in any CSS format (hex, rgb, hsl, color names)
argTypes.default: Slot for custom icon. Allows inserting your own SVG components
